mapper.sql: id, type, year, green_ratio, property_fee, plot_ratio, area_property, created, updated, name, status, pic, IFNULL(geo_addr,'') geo_addr, bis_addr, latitude, longitude, household_num
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from tb_areas
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_areas (id, type, year, green_ratio, property_fee, plot_ratio, area_property, created, updated, name, status, pic, geo_addr, bis_addr, latitude, longitude, household_num) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{greenRatio,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{propertyFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{plotRatio,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{areaProperty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{geoAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bisAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{householdNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
